local_intent: Verify contact at the specified force threshold; if not present, re-establish by re-detecting the block if needed, re-approaching above it, lowering until contact, and confirming contact.
assumptions: Force sensing available for contact check
Raster scan can re-acquire visibility if lost
coherence_with_global: Implements verify phase centered on ContactDetected with recovery: visibility scan (up to 3), re-approach above target, lower until contact, then re-check; matches global failure-and-recovery and timing bins.
